DOC.brief_summary: This research study evaluate effect repeat intravitreal injection bacteria around eye .
DOC.brief_title: A Research Study Evaluate Effects Repeated Intravitreal Injections Bacteria Around Eye
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective study determine whether conjunctival bacterial flora alter and/or demonstrate increase antibiotic resistance serial intravitreal injection prophylactic topical antibiotic use pre- post-injection compare use .
DOC.criteria: Subjects eligible follow criterion meet : Ability provide write informed consent comply study assessment full duration study . Have diagnose neovascular AMD , CRVO BRVO . Have determine investigator require intravitreal injection bevacizumab ranibizumab . Subjects meet follow criterion ineligible study entry : Prior intraocular injection either eye . Chronic use opthalmic medication . Contact lens wear . Ocular surgery within past 6 month . Use ophthalmic medication either eye ocular infection within past 6 month . Use systemic antibiotic within 6 month . Known allergy contraindication povidone iodine fluoroquinolones .
